mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANIMALS(ASEQ, SIGUN_CD,SIGUN_NM,ABDM_IDNTFY_NO,RECEPT_DE,DISCVRY_PLC_INFO,STATE_NM,PBLANC_IDNTFY_NO,PBLANC_BEGIN_DE,PBLANC_END_DE,SPECIES_NM,COLOR_NM,AGE_INFO,BDWGH_INFO,SEX_NM,NEUT_YN,SFETR_INFO,SHTER_NM,SHTER_TELNO,PROTECT_PLC,REFINE_ROADNM_ADDR,REFINE_LOTNO_ADDR,REFINE_ZIP_CD,JURISD_INST_NM,IMAGE_COURS) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.ASEQ),0)+1 FROM ANIMALS A),#{SIGUN_CD},#{SIGUN_NM},#{ABDM_IDNTFY_NO},#{RECEPT_DE},#{DISCVRY_PLC_INFO},#{STATE_NM},#{PBLANC_IDNTFY_NO},#{PBLANC_BEGIN_DE},#{PBLANC_END_DE},#{SPECIES_NM},#{COLOR_NM},#{AGE_INFO},#{BDWGH_INFO},#{SEX_NM},#{NEUT_YN},#{SFETR_INFO},#{SHTER_NM},#{SHTER_TELNO},#{PROTECT_PLC},#{REFINE_ROADNM_ADDR},#{REFINE_LOTNO_ADDR},#{REFINE_ZIP_CD},#{JURISD_INST_NM},#{IMAGE_COURS})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANIMALS
AND SIGUN_CD = #{sortRegion} and SPECIES_NM like concat('%', #{sortSpecies}, '%')
AND SIGUN_CD = #{sortRegion}
AND SPECIES_NM like concat('%', #{sortSpecies}, '%')

SELECT ASEQ, SIGUN_CD, SIGUN_NM, ABDM_IDNTFY_NO, RECEPT_DE, DISCVRY_PLC_INFO, STATE_NM, PBLANC_IDNTFY_NO, DATE_FORMAT(PBLANC_BEGIN_DE,'%Y/%m/%d') AS PBLANC_BEGIN_DE , DATE_FORMAT(PBLANC_END_DE,'%Y/%m/%d') AS PBLANC_END_DE ,SPECIES_NM,COLOR_NM,AGE_INFO,BDWGH_INFO,SEX_NM,NEUT_YN, SFETR_INFO, SHTER_NM, SHTER_TELNO, PROTECT_PLC, REFINE_ROADNM_ADDR, REFINE_LOTNO_ADDR, REFINE_ZIP_CD, JURISD_INST_NM, IMAGE_COURS FROM ANIMALS WHERE ASEQ=#{ASEQ}
select SIGUN_NM, PBLANC_END_DE, SPECIES_NM, IMAGE_COURS from animals where DATEDIFF(NOW(),PBLANC_END_DE) LIMIT 3;
